properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 5:01AM EST until February 6 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected
in low lying areas due to tidal flooding.

* WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 1 PM EST this afternoon,
especially around the time of high tide.

* IMPACTS...Water is expected to go over a portion of the bulkhead
near the Straits Point bridge, and also cover yards in the St
Georges Creek and St Marys River areas. Minor shoreline
inundation up to one foot above ground is possible elsewhere.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and one half to two feet above
normal. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 11:02 AM. The
next high tide at Piney Point is at 11:38 AM and the next high
tide at Coltons Point is at 12:14 PM.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
